people_also_ask.question: How long does it take to beat Planescape Torment?
people_also_ask.heading: about 32½ Hours
people_also_ask.heading2: When focusing on the main objectives, Planescape: Torment is about 32½ Hours in length. If you're a gamer that strives to see all aspects of the game, you are likely to spend around 65 Hours to obtain 100% completion.
people_also_ask.title: How long is Planescape: Torment? | HowLongToBeat

people_also_ask.question: How many endings does Planescape Torment have?
people_also_ask.heading: Planescape: Torment, a game that I otherwise love, had about eight different conclusions, each based on a particular choice the player could make at the very end of the game.21-Dec-2004
people_also_ask.title: The Designer's Notebook: How Many Endings Does a Game ...

people_also_ask.question: Is Planescape Torment Sci Fi?
people_also_ask.heading: Torment is a buckwild anthology of anything-goes sci-fi and fantasy storytelling. You're the Last Castoff, who is basically a wandering wizard's dirty sock, a consciousness born into the old body of a “changing god.” They change often, I suppose.23-Jan-2017
people_also_ask.title: Three bizarre sci-fi tales from Torment: Tides of Numenera

knowledge_panel.description: planescape: torment is a role-playing video game developed by black isle studios and published by interplay entertainment. released for microsoft windows on december 12, 1999, the game takes place in locations from the multiverse of planescape, a dungeons & dragons fantasy campaign setting. wikipedia
